00039 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_PRODUCT_H
00040 #define CONSTRAINT_PRODUCT_H
00041 
00042 #include "constraint_and.h"
00043 
00045 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00046 struct ProductConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00047 {
00048   virtual string constraint_name()
00049   { return "Product"; }
00050   
00051   VarRef1 var1;
00052   VarRef2 var2;
00053   VarRef3 var3;
00054   ProductConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, VarRef1 _var1, VarRef2 _var2, VarRef3 _var3) :
00055     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var1(_var1), var2(_var2), var3(_var3)
00056   { }
00057   
00058   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00059   {
00060     triggerCollection t;
00061     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), LowerBound));
00062     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 2), LowerBound));
00063     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 3), LowerBound));
00064     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00065     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 2), UpperBound));
00066     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 3), UpperBound));
00067     return t;
00068   }
00069   
00070   DomainInt mult_max(DomainInt min1, DomainInt max1, DomainInt min2, DomainInt max2)
00071   { return mymax(mymax(min1*min2, min1*max2),mymax(max1*min2, max1*max2)); }
00072   
00073   DomainInt mult_min(DomainInt min1, DomainInt max1, DomainInt min2, DomainInt max2)
00074   { return mymin(mymin(min1*min2, min1*max2),mymin(max1*min2, max1*max2)); }
00075   
00076   DomainInt round_up_div(DomainInt x, DomainInt y)
00077   {
00078     if(y == 0)
00079       return 0;
00080     ldiv_t division = div(checked_cast<long>(x), checked_cast<long>(y));
00081     long return_val = division.quot;
00082     if(division.rem != 0)
00083       return_val++;
00084     return return_val;
00085   }
00086   
00087   DomainInt round_down_div(DomainInt x, DomainInt y)
00088   { 
00089     if(y == 0)
00090       return DomainInt_Max;
00091     return x / y; 
00092   }
00093   
00094   virtual void propagate(int, DomainDelta)
00095   {
00096     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Product);
00097     DomainInt var1_min = var1.getMin();
00098     DomainInt var1_max = var1.getMax();
00099     DomainInt var2_min = var2.getMin();
00100     DomainInt var2_max = var2.getMax();
00101     DomainInt var3_min = var3.getMin();
00102     DomainInt var3_max = var3.getMax();
00103     
00104     if((var1_min >= 0) && (var2_min >= 0))
00105     {
00106       // We don't have to deal with negative numbers. yay!
00107       
00108       var3_min = max(var3_min, var1_min * var2_min);
00109       var3_max = min(var3_max, var1_max * var2_max);
00110       
00111       var1_min = max(var1_min, round_up_div(var3_min, var2_max));
00112       var1_max = min(var1_max, round_down_div(var3_max, var2_min));
00113       
00114       var2_min = max(var2_min, round_up_div(var3_min, var1_max));
00115       var2_max = min(var2_max, round_down_div(var3_max, var1_min));
00116       
00117       var1.setMin(var1_min);
00118       var1.setMax(var1_max);
00119       var2.setMin(var2_min);
00120       var2.setMax(var2_max);
00121       var3.setMin(var3_min);
00122       var3.setMax(var3_max);
00123     }
00124     else
00125     {
00126       var3.setMax(mult_max(var1_min, var1_max, var2_min, var2_max));
00127       var3.setMin(mult_min(var1_min, var1_max, var2_min, var2_max));
00128       if(var1.isAssigned())
00129       {
00130         DomainInt val1 = var1.getAssignedValue();
00131         if(val1 > 0)
00132         { 
00133           var3.setMin(var2.getMin() * val1);
00134           var3.setMax(var2.getMax() * val1);
00135         }
00136         else
00137         {
00138           var3.setMin(var2.getMax() * val1);
00139           var3.setMax(var2.getMin() * val1);
00140         }
00141       }
00142       
00143       if(var2.isAssigned())
00144       {
00145         DomainInt val2 = var2.getAssignedValue();
00146         if(val2 > 0)
00147         { 
00148           var3.setMin(var1.getMin() * val2);
00149           var3.setMax(var1.getMax() * val2);
00150         }
00151         else
00152         {
00153           var3.setMin(var1.getMax() * val2);
00154           var3.setMax(var1.getMin() * val2);
00155         }
00156       }
00157     }
00158   }
00159   
00160   virtual void full_propagate()
00161   { propagate(0,0); }
00162   
00163   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00164   {
00165     D_ASSERT(v_size == 3);
00166     return (v[0] * v[1]) == v[2];
00167   }
00168   
00169   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00170   { 
00171     vector<AnyVarRef> v;
00172     v.push_back(var1);
00173     v.push_back(var2);
00174     v.push_back(var3);
00175     return v;
00176   }
00177   
00178   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00179     {  
00180       for(DomainInt v1 = var1.getMin(); v1 <= var1.getMax(); ++v1)
00181       {
00182         if(var1.inDomain(v1))
00183         {
00184           for(DomainInt v2 = var2.getMin(); v2 <= var2.getMax(); ++v2)
00185           {
00186             if(var2.inDomain(v2) && var3.inDomain(v1 * v2))
00187             {
00188               assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, v1));
00189               assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, v2));
00190               assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, v1 * v2));
00191               return true;
00192             }
00193           }
00194         }
00195       }
00196       return false;
00197     }
00198     
00199     
00200      // Function to make it reifiable in the lousiest way.
00201   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00202   {
00203       vector<AnyVarRef> t;
00204       t.push_back(var1);
00205       t.push_back(var2);
00206       t.push_back(var3);
00207       return new CheckAssignConstraint<vector<AnyVarRef>, ProductConstraint>(stateObj, t, *this);
00208   }
00209 };
00210 
00211 
00212 
00213 inline AbstractConstraint*
00214 BuildCT_PRODUCT2(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<BoolVarRef>& vars, const vector<BoolVarRef>& var2, ConstraintBlob&)
00215 {
00216   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 2);
00217   D_ASSERT(var2.size() == 1);
00218   return AndCon(stateObj, vars[0], vars[1], var2[0]);
00219 }
00220 
00221 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2>
00222 AbstractConstraint*
00223 BuildCT_PRODUCT2(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<VarRef1>& vars, const vector<VarRef2>& var2, ConstraintBlob&)
00224 { 
00225   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 2);
00226   D_ASSERT(var2.size() == 1);
00227   return new ProductConstraint<VarRef1,VarRef1,VarRef2>(stateObj, vars[0],vars[1],var2[0]); 
00228 }
00229 
00230 #endif
